name: Twilio Components
description:
Paste is Twilio’s design system used to build accessible, cohesive, and high-quality customer experiences. 


The Twilio Components file includes shared components from polished assets to works in progress. Use this file with the Twilio Design Language for text, colour, and effect styles.


We use an emoji key to highlight pages and layers:

  • Any layer with a ⚙️ emoji indicates that there are nested variants available.
  • Any layer with a ✏️ emoji indicates an editable layer. 
  • Any page with a 🧰 emoji indicates local file assets or utilities like a file cover.
  • Any page with a 🚧 emoji indicates a work in progress.


Learn more about Twilio and Paste at: paste.twilio.design
